00040 #ifndef _inputquerytool_cpp
00041 #define _inputquerytool_cpp

00043 #include "inputquerytool.h"
00044 #include "eventmanager.h"

00046 #include "world.h"

00048 namespace phys
00049 {
00050     InputQueryTool::InputQueryTool()
00051         : MouseXCache(0),
00052           MouseYCache(0)
00053     {
00054         this->GameWorld = World::GetWorldPointer();
00055     }
00056 
00057     InputQueryTool::~InputQueryTool()
00058     {
00059     }
00060 
00061     Whole InputQueryTool::GetMouseX()
00062     { return MouseXCache; }
00063 
00064     Whole InputQueryTool::GetMouseY()
00065     { return MouseYCache; }
00066 
00067     Vector2 InputQueryTool::GetMouseCoordinates()
00068     { return MouseCoordinates; }

00070     Vector2 InputQueryTool::GetMousePrevFrameOffset()
00071     { return MousePrevFrameOffset; }

00073     bool InputQueryTool::IsMouseButtonPushed(short unsigned int MouseButton)
00074     {
00075         if(MouseButton >= this->MouseButtonLimit)
00076             {this->GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Unsupported mouse button access through WorldQueryTool");}
00077         return MouseButtonCache.count(MouseButton);
00078     }
00079 
00080     bool InputQueryTool::IsKeyboardButtonPushed(MetaCode::InputCode KeyboardButton)
00081     {
00082         return KeyboardButtonCache.count(KeyboardButton);
00083     }
00084 
00085     MetaCode::ButtonState InputQueryTool::GetMouseButtonState(short unsigned int MouseButton)
00086     {
00087         std::map<short unsigned int,MetaCode>::iterator it = MouseButtonCache.find(MouseButton);
00088         if(it != MouseButtonCache.end())
00089         {
00090             int Code = (*it).second.GetMetaValue();
00091             switch (Code)
00092             {
00093                 case -1:
00094                     return MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING;
00095                     break;
00096                 case 1:
00097                     return MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING;
00098                     break;
00099                 case 2:
00100                     return MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN;
00101                     break;
00102                 default:
00103                     break;
00104             }
00105         }
00106         return MetaCode::BUTTON_UP;
00107     }
00108 
00109     MetaCode::ButtonState InputQueryTool::GetKeyboardButtonState(MetaCode::InputCode KeyboardButton)
00110     {
00111         std::map<unsigned int,MetaCode>::iterator it = KeyboardButtonCache.find(KeyboardButton);
00112         if(it != KeyboardButtonCache.end())
00113         {
00114             int Code = (*it).second.GetMetaValue();
00115             switch (Code)
00116             {
00117                 case -1:
00118                     return MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING;
00119                     break;
00120                 case 1:
00121                     return MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING;
00122                     break;
00123                 case 2:
00124                     return MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN;
00125                     break;
00126                 default:
00127                     break;
00128             }
00129         }
00130         return MetaCode::BUTTON_UP;
00131     }
00132 
00133     MetaCode::MouseWheelState InputQueryTool::GetMouseWheelState()
00134     {
00135         return WheelState;
00136     }
00137 
00138     void InputQueryTool::GatherEvents(bool ClearEventsFromEventMgr)
00139     {
00140         KeyboardButtonCache.clear();
00141         MouseButtonCache.clear();
00142         WheelState = MetaCode::MOUSEWHEEL_UNCHANGED;
00143         Vector2 PrevPos((Real)MouseXCache,(Real)MouseYCache);
00144         std::list<EventUserInput*>* UserInput = this->GameWorld->GetEventManager()->GetAllUserInputEvents();   // Get the updated list of events
00145         if( ClearEventsFromEventMgr )
00146             { this->GameWorld->GetEventManager()->RemoveAllSpecificEvents(EventBase::UserInput); }
00147 
00148         for(std::list<EventUserInput*>::iterator Iter = UserInput->begin(); Iter!=UserInput->end(); Iter++) //for each event
00149         {
00150             for(unsigned int c = 0; c<(*Iter)->GetMetaCodeCount(); c++) //For each metacode in the event
00151             {                                                           //Newer Items should take precedence of older ones, so only store the oldest ones
00152                 if( (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).IsKeyboardButton() ) //is it a Key
00153                 {
00154                     if(0 != (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue()) //see MetaCode::ButtonState
00155                     {
00156                         this->KeyboardButtonCache[(*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode()] = (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c);
00157                     }
00158                     continue;
00159                 }
00160 
00161                 if ( MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEHORIZONTAL == (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() )
00162                 {
00163                     this->MouseXCache = (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue();
00164                     continue;
00165                 }
00166 
00167                 if ( MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEVERTICAL == (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() )
00168                 {
00169                     this->MouseYCache = (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue();
00170                     continue;
00171                 }
00172 
00173                 if ( MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON == (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() )
00174                 {
00175                     if(0 != (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue()) //see MetaCode::ButtonState
00176                     {
00177                         this->MouseButtonCache[(*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetID()] = (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c);
00178                     }
00179                     continue;
00180                 }
00181 
00182                 if ( MetaCode::MOUSEWHEELVERTICAL == (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() )
00183                 {
00184                     int code = (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue();
00185                     if(-1 == code)
00186                     {
00187                         this->WheelState = MetaCode::MOUSEWHEEL_DOWN;
00188                     }
00189                     else if(1 == code)
00190                     {
00191                         this->WheelState = MetaCode::MOUSEWHEEL_UP;
00192                     }
00193                     continue;
00194                 }
00195                 /// @todo Add support for joysticks events to InputQueryTool
00196             }
00197         }
00198         MouseCoordinates = Vector2((Real)MouseXCache,(Real)MouseYCache);
00199         MousePrevFrameOffset = MouseCoordinates - PrevPos;
00200 
00201         if( ClearEventsFromEventMgr )//Erase everything if we were asked to.
00202         {
00203             for(std::list<EventUserInput*>::iterator Iter = UserInput->begin(); !UserInput->empty(); Iter = UserInput->begin())
00204             {
00205                 delete(*Iter);
00206                 UserInput->remove(*Iter);
00207             }
00208         }
00209     }
00210 }
00211 
00212 #endif
